content: Is there an easy way in HAPI (with DSTU2) to export (to xml/json) the entire medical record of a patient - i.e. the Patient resource with all resources that reference it, recursively, and also all the resources that the Patient resource references, recursively - and then import the entire medical record to a FHIR server that does not have this patient? I know that HAPI supports the "everything" operation for Patient, but I don't know if it covers the entire medical record, and I don't know if this exported bundle can be easily imported.
